title: Acronis True Image 2016 v19.0.5628 Activator Only [deepstatus]
description:
[b]Acronis True Image 2016 v19.0.5628 Activator Only [deepstatus][/b]




[img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/08/18/acronis.png[/img]




[b]Acronis bring the final 2016 release of True Image backup program. 
One bootable covers all languages.[/b]

Acronis True Image 2016 - Protect your digital life with the #1 backup solution.
Back up your entire computer including your operating system, applications and data,
not just files and folders to an external hard drive or NAS. 
Restore backed up data including your operating system, 
application and all your data to your existing computer or an entirely separate piece of hardware, 
or restore specific data as needed.




[img]http://s12.postimg.org/rrtgxddql/thumb_9514_sshot_2_nhxt.jpg[/img]




[b]What's new in Acronis True Image 2016 19.0 Build 5628:[/b]

[url=http://www.acronis.com/en-sg/support/updates/changes.html?p=37994]http://www.acronis.com/en-sg/support/updates/changes.html?p=37994[/url]

[b]System Requirements:[/b]

- Windows XP SP3
- Windows 7 SP1 (all editions)
- Windows 8 (all editions)
- Windows 8.1 (all editions)
- Windows Home Server 2011
- Windows 10
[b]- Windows Vista (all editions) is not supported[/b]



[img]http://s15.postimg.org/g8yg6henv/thumb_5078_sshot_1_ak5r.jpg[/img]





[INSTALLATION]


- In order to this goes right, unistall any previus version.

1) You know, unrar with WinRar or other archiver of your choise.

2) Disconnect internet!

3) Install True Image, start it and use one of these keys:

XTSLAH7A-T7BQZMVA-AZN85T47-MV5PQS29-NWPBLM9M-ENDN2VA4-8ZF7WEGA-XQ78Y8CN

or

Q2SVQXWX-8DQNQD9X-GF6XUEQW-NCTPMR94-VMSQT8YB-775TCCUP-FQ43Z5WP-NLJVDH6S

4) Wait a few seconds, then terminate True Image

5) Run ActivatorAcronisTIH.exe with Admin Rights
  if you read "activation successful!" everything is ok


6) Now you have a fully actived ATI
